title: Reckless Truths
description: Every secret has an expiration date. . .USA Today and Wall Street Journal bestselling author Autumn Jones Lake delivers the next highly anticipated installment of the Lost Kings MC series.Hidden truths are silent lies.One devastating truth rocked me to my soul. In an instant, my entire identity was erased and replaced. It’s a secret I must bury or risk hurting the ones I love the most.Blood never lies.The truth is a painful weapon. It cuts deep and can scar you for life. Even when the pain fades, the truth remains.There is strength in loyalty.My father keeps reminding me, every secret has an expiration date. Better to face the pain and endure the fallout. The strength of our Lost Kings MC family will pull us through.But everyone—even family—has a breaking point.
author: Autumn Jones Lake
